page.title: 18Antrim Agricultural Show.
page.content: Antrim Agricultural Show is always held in the Castle Grounds towards the end of July.At Antrim Show there is an exibition of school children's art and craft.Clotworthy House is used as an art and florist gallery. In the morning there usually is the animal show where all different kinds of animals are judged. In what used to be the old Courtyard they put up stalls which sell quite a lot of things. The results of the animal judging are told in the afternoon .Usually the show is not over until 5 o'clock p.m. The next day mainly consists of Horse Jumping.
